name: Amexio Label
description: Amexio Label can be easily wrapped around any text and configure using the different responsive styling

properties.name: size
properties.description: Responsive Font size, large, medium, small, large-24, large-44, large-50, large-54, large-56, large-9vw (viewport-width) & large-bold, medium-bold, small-bold, large-24-bold, large-44-bold, large-50-bold, large-54-bold, large-56-bold, large-9vw-bold (viewport-width)
